text: Oh thank god, you made it.
Well anyway, I don't think I need to point out the storm outside.
I haven't seen such a strong storm in a long time.
The lights might go out, if that happens I will need you to turn them back on.
I can't really operate a pacient if there's no light, can I?
The fuse box is in the room to the right.
I just hope nothing bad happens.
